It disappeared below the treeline as I was driving.  It was hard to keep an eye on due to the fact that there was quite a bit of traffic, just like the last time I saw it.  I am not crazy and was disturbed that I have seen it twice under similar circumstances.  I had never seen a UFO before or floating rectangles.  The sky was partially overcast both times, but a much lighter grey.

records.summary: triangular airplane that sorta looked like it but different hovering over building.
records.story: triangular airplane that sorta looked like it but different hovering over building. We My two son ages 14 and 12 and baby age 2 she was asleep.  We were driving home from the Tampa airport about 8 miles away driving on the suncoast pkwy towards home after welcoming home my mother in law.  I look from a distance and of course just thought it was an airplane, but as we got closer it stayed in the same place, I am sure 747's do not hover.   I grew up in Cleveland Ohio and right by the hopkins airport and never seen a plane hover like this,as I got closer it was larger than any plane that of a 747,  This plane that we saw was just hovering over this building, my oldest son said mom its not moving, I said its just a slow desent, trying to keep my eyes on the road as well.  Then I said as we got closer holy crap its not moving! I thought it might be a stealth, since we did have windows down I did not hear anything as far as an airplane engine, it was rather close and still not moving.  I of course did not think anything of it, since it was so close to t! he airport, and macdill airforce base... but with my boys they and now I believe it was a UFO I have never seen an airplane hover like this then just disapear. but not to alarm my 12 yr old who still to this day the movie Signs freaks him out,  I said must be a stealth but my oldest reasoned with me, it couldnt be. Are we right did any one encounter this or are we just seeing a new air craft hover?  I just wish I would have thought to take a pic with my cell phone.

records.summary: Floating Humanoid sighting in Tampa (West Chase) Florida area Aug 4, 2010.  ((NUFORC Note:  May not be a serious report.  PD))
records.story: Floating Humanoid sighting in Tampa (West Chase) Florida area Aug 4, 2010 We were in a Burger King drive through line in the West Chase area of Tampa when we looked up and saw a dark humanoid figure floating down from the sky.  It was about 400 or 500 feet from us.   There were no airplanes, helicopters, or other crafts seen in the area, at that time.  We were stuck in the line at a drive through restaurant so we were not able to follow it, to see where it was landing.   The weather was over cast, and shortly after the sighting, it began to rain. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  Possible hoax??  PD))

records.summary: Saucer Shaped UFO sighted in night sky
records.story: Saucer Shaped UFO sighted in night sky I was outside my home, just taking in the fresh night air and saw a bright object high in the night sky.   At first, I thought it was an airplane, however, as it descended and finally came into view, I finally realized it was, in fact, a saucer-shaped UFO, metallic in nature and dark blue to silver in some areas.   The craft was large, a house-size vehicle, and had a half-spherical shape located/connected on its bottom.  The sighting ended when I had to enter the house to take care of my child.  I did not see it again that evening or since.

records.summary: unknown falling object from the sky over tampa fl
records.story: unknown falling object from the sky over tampa fl Something falling from the sky, falling down and to the left leaving 2 pink lines behind it. Seen with a bag boy in a parking lot. From where we where it we looked south to see it. Thought it was a part of a NASA shuttle falling to earth, appeared to be leaving a pink train behind it. It was during sunset, so the lines left behind looked pink in that light. I watched it for at least 4 minutes, until it faded around some

records.summary: somthing  came out of the ocean and flew up with a boom, out of sight in seconds
records.story: somthing  came out of the ocean and flew up with a boom, out of sight in seconds 3 buddies and I went fishing on a 42 ft.boat about 80 miles s.w. mcdill a.f.b. we fished all day and around midnight we saw a lil storm north west of us going south, lightning was realy cool, flashed greenish color on the ocean and some wind but nothing we havent seen before.but we was on gaurd in case the storm got worse.now around 2:00 am the storm got a lil closer and we where all watching it. a lil later evey thing on the boat went dead,radio,fish finder ,sonar ,lights,even our battery powered flash lights whitch was weird cause they where battery powered.cell phones where also dead.we noticed the ocean started to rummble a lil bit, but it was not thunder the water began to vibrate a lil,flash of lighning showed up greenish on the ocean, we didnt know what to think we was talking about going in to shore rather than stay till day break.a lil later may be 30 mins. we saw a greenish glow in the ocean it was pretty big ,a buddy joked it was a sub.well then s! omething came out of the ocean with a greenish glow,rippleing the water,then hovering over the ocean about a mile or two away from our boat for about 10 mins.it must have been 3-4 times the size of our boat or bigger.it was glowing greenish.then it went west out to sea and then straight up, a flash , and gone. then a boom. it seemed to turn to check us out before leaving the area.when the event was over we started the boat and everything came back on. so we headed back to shore.half way back the sun started to rise.we looked at the time and we lost about 4-5 hours out on the ocean.it should not have been sun up yet.we didnt know what to think but we was alright and we had our fish we caught that day still on ice. we talked about what we saw and came to say ,that it was a ufo. not a sub, plane, ship ,boat, ect. not millitary, that i know of.you may email me if you like

records.summary: 2 red globes in sky over Tampa on July 4th 2010
records.story: 2 red globes in sky over Tampa on July 4th 2010 We were in our back yard shooting off fireworks around 10pm.  We saw 2 reddish balls in the sky east of us kind of low. (were not fireworks) (maybe near McDill Airforce base)   They were just there not moving much and one finally flew off towards the northwest.  It was not close enough to see any details of the red globe.  We could not see the other light after that.   We took a picture.  It is not a real good picture since we did not have a high powered camera but there is clearly a round red ball visible.

records.summary: I was driving at about 6:20 pm, bright daylight, in late rush hour when I saw a large, gray, rectangular shape floating low in the sky
records.story: I was driving at about 6:20 pm, bright daylight, in late rush hour when I saw a large, gray, rectangular shape floating low in the sky Low flying, one dimensional side-view of a slightly irregular rectangular shape floating in the sky.  The shape was alternating between floating slowly along, veering a bit to the right of the road, side to side, and then moving quickly beyond where the road would dead-end into a swampy area, back behind the tree line in the distance. It appeared to be coming down. It was broad daylight and I have to wonder if other drivers saw it as well, or how they could have missed it. It was matte gray and almost appeared fluid in its movement.  I thought it might be a weather balloon, but I am not sure a weather balloon would be rectangular.  I thought it might be a slowly falling satellite or something.  The rectangle had one vertical side slightly longer than the other. I am a mother of 4 who was on her way to pick up my 2 daughters from dance class.  I was  really worried as this object appeared to be descending. I was afraid it might fall on the building where my daughters were--although it did appear to be floating down, not actually falling. I can't judge the size of it because I am not sure how far away it was from me.  I only saw one face of the object.  It seemed to be following the path of a fairly busy suburban road, not a main highway.  But I watched it as I drove about 5 miles.   Once it had gotten out of my sight for about a minute and a half.  I do not know where it went, if it was behind trees and buildings or away.

records.summary: 5 discs along I-75
records.story: 5 discs along I-75 While driving from Tampa to Leesburg along interstate 75, somewhere in pasco county, my cousin and I witnessed 5 saucer like discs scattered along a section of the highway. None more than 75ft from the ground. One was directly in the road and we drove right under it and it didn't move nor did anything happen with us or the truck. 2nd craft was to our right in an open field just hovering the same as the first. A 3rd craft was on the oncoming traffic side of the highway moving away slowly while a 4th was coming towards us but on the opposite side of the highway.. the 5th craft could barely be seen between the trees on the opposite side of the road. All crafts were displaying thousands of multi-colored lights on their underside, flashing at different speeds and no pattern. They seemed to be searching for something... We witnessed them from about 3miles away until we drive under and kept going. I couldn't stop, as my cousin wouldn't let me;  behind us was another car and a semi truck a little further behind. The sighting was in an area where there was no houses or infrastructure only cleared land Manuel for cattle. So I don't know what the town was, but I'm sure we were going through pasco county. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Bright hovering white light and triangle craft seen over Tampa Bay.
records.story: Bright hovering white light and triangle craft seen over Tampa Bay. I was driving East across the Courtney Campbell Causeway from Clearwater to Tampa, around 9pm when I noticed one of the street lights looked different because the light was white compared to the yellow street lamps, and much brighter, but relatively the same size. When I looked closer I noticed that it was also higher above the street lights and that it was hovering in the air independently.  At this point I drove past it and could no longer see it, but then ahead of me to the right, over the water I saw something else, at first I could only see reddish lights, but they were not blinking like the lights on a plane. It was also moving much slower, and was much lower than planes fly in that area.  It was moving slowly towards me and then at a certain point it flew across the road, a little ahead of me. It was low enough so that I could see it's shape. It was triangular, with red lights on each point and a white light in the middle. Then it flew out of view.  I don't know if it is important or not, but less than an hour earlier, the causeway had the most awful traffic. I was driving home from work and what usually takes 20 minutes took me two full hours. I only bring this up because I have a feeling that the UFO's are sometimes attracted to our energies, both positive and negative.  This is not the first time I have seen these same crafts. In 2009 I was driving from Tampa to Miami and my friend and we saw these same triangles with the lights on them. One also crossed the road over us and flashed very bright beams of light, which seemed to come from the lights on the corners. Then a few minutes later we saw a bright hovering white light over the road, which looked like a thin metal blimp when we passed under it, and on the other side was a bright red light which hid the metal object.

records.summary: Two white lights that looked like stars followed by a third that moved away at a rapid speed.
records.story: Two white lights that looked like stars followed by a third that moved away at a rapid speed. I was driving home from work early in the morning and I saw two bright lights in the sky about two hundred feet apart.  At first I thought that they might me starts but they seemed too low and too bright and they seemed to hover and move slightly. Out of the corner of my eye I saw what looked like a shooting star but when I looked at it, it was the same shape and size of the other too lights and it moved extremely fast, faster that any thing I have ever seen.  When it was gone I watched the other two lights closely until I made it home.  They seemed to glow now and then and turn orange. I kept thinking that they must be starts but I have never seen stars that did this.

records.summary: Chilling, giant, bright, green ball of fire between Lakewood (Providence) and hwy 41.
records.story: Chilling, giant, bright, green ball of fire between Lakewood (Providence) and hwy 41. I was driving down Lakewood(Providence) at night, listening to music, as usual.  As I was driving I'd gotten chills out of nowhere and looked around, my normal response to chills.  Thats when I'd noticed a giant, bright, green ball of fire in the sky, with a trail of green and white light coming off of the back of it.  It looked as if it were literally glowing green, and when I strained my eyes to observe it a little better, it seemed like there may have even been something black inside of it.  It had appeared to be falling from the sky.  Immediately, I'd turned down the music and turned to call my mom so I could make sure she, my son, and my family were okay, worried that it may have been falling towards my house...  But by the time I looked back up after dialing her number, it was gone.   This is not the first time I've seen a UFO incident, just the first time it's scared me enough to want to tell people, as well as the closest (even though it really wasnt very clos! e) I've ever seen anything like this.

records.summary: Amber ball with tail
records.story: Amber ball with tail Amber glowing ball with attached amber tail, low altitude, above the range of fireworks, moving east at a very slow pace above Lutz, Fl. Lost sight of it behind trees and it was gone when the trees cleared. Observed by 3 non related sober people. Aprox. sight time 3-4 minutes.

records.summary: It was a large green sphere streaking from the East toward the West (toward Tampa Bay & Gulf).  It had a tail, like a comet tail extend
records.story: It was a large green sphere streaking from the East toward the West (toward Tampa Bay & Gulf).  It had a tail, like a comet tail extending from the Sphere.  It appeared above the trees on Old Memorial Road, and seemed to be descending. We are retired. Both with college educations.  We were coming from our Church, which we had been cleaning, when we spotted the object.

records.summary: Green fireball with tail in night sky.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possible meteor, containing copper??  PD))
records.story: Green fireball with tail in night sky On 8/6/2011 at 11:05 pm two of us were sitting outside facing southeast.  A bright green fireball with an orange aura and tail appeared traveling across the horizon from north to south.   It then began traveling downward at a 90 degree angle.  It was extremely bright and traveled in a deliberate path.  Our view lasted for a few seconds before disappearing behind the tree line along the neighborhood lake.  There was no sound.

records.summary: Bright white light hovering high in sky over S. Tampa.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possible twinkling star?  PD))
records.story: Bright white light hovering high in sky over S. Tampa Bright white light hovering in sky:  not a helicopter (too high); hovers in a graceful, dancing-like movement; with naked eye, ( looks like bright star, but moves).   With iPad, see one triangular-shaped object with possibly another disc-like object nearby (video captured). ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Fireball swirling with black center shot thru sky in downward spiral heading west
records.story: fireball swirling with black center shot thru sky in downward spiral heading west A swirling firball shot thru the sky in a East to West direction dropping downward.  It was flaming red with black center. Made no noise.

records.summary: It had to be anywhere from 8:50pm to 9:03pm when me and a friend saw this bright fire ba
records.story: I was on my lunch break at work with a friend.   It had to be anywhere from 8:50pm to 9:03pm when me and a friend saw this bright fire ball in the sky coming from the north headed south.  We watch it disapear in the clouds.   I'm not sure the zip code is right, but I work at The University of Tampa next to downtown Tampa.  There's a news channel there were it pass.  They must got footage of it because it was fly pretty low.   All I know is it look red, a bit of yellow and blue like a flame.  Fireball is what my friend said it look like and I agree with him.  I know for sure it wasn't a aircaft I seen before and also it had no noise. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: THIS OBJECT LOOKS LIKE A BRIGHT STAR BUT IS NOT, IT MOVES AND FOLLOWS US.
records.story: THIS OBJECT LOOKS LIKE A BRIGHT STAR BUT IS NOT, IT MOVES AND FOLLOWS US. MY WIFE AND I SEE THIS ALMOST EVERY NIGHT. IT LOOKS LIKE A STAR BUT IS NOT WE HAVE SEEN IT MOVE, AND IS NOT AN AIRPLANE.  IT FOLLOWS OUR VEHICLE FROM STARTING POINT TO DESTINATION.  IT SHOWS AT TIMES LIKE A SMALL RED TAIL.  WE WENT TO GALINSBURG TENNESSEE TO THE MOUNTAINS ON A CABIN AND OUR DAUGHTER HER HUSBAND, MY WIFE AND HER SISTER AND DAUGHTER, AND MYSELF SAW THIS HUGE LIGHT IN THE CENTER AND IT LOOKS LIKE A STAR BUT IS NOT.  MY WIFE AND I HAVE SEEN THIS OBJECT FOLLOWS US. ASND WE HAVE SEEN THIS OBJECT WITH RED AND GREEN FLASHING LIGHTS. AND SOMETIMES IS 1 OR MORE OF THEM. HOPE THIS HELPS,  THANK YOU,  JORGE HUGO NODA.

records.summary: UFO WAS HOVERING AND MAKING A WEIRD SOUND THEN IT TOOK OFF.
records.story: UFO WAS HOVERING AND MAKING A WEIRD SOUND THEN IT TOOK OFF.

records.summary: The pinkish orange lights dimmed out as the diamond shaped object moved overhead toward the east.
records.story: The pinkish orange lights dimmed out as the diamond shaped object moved overhead toward the east. I walked out of the house toward the west and I saw a pinkish orange light flickering (like an arc welder does when welding) across the width of the front of the object coming toward me.  It was bright at first and dimmed to a dull red as the object approached , then it dimmed out as the diamond shaped object moved slowly overhead.  It appeared to be a light grey or dull white with no lights at all about 40 percent of the size of a full moon.  It continued to fly slowly and silently directly overhead toward the east-slightly southeast direction at a constant slow speed until it disappeared into the tree line.  There were no clouds, no wind ,it was an absolutely clear sky.

records.summary: 2 Orange Lights
records.story: 2 Orange Lights Two round objects (one following the other at about a 8-10 sec interval) each seemed like aircraft with a bright solid orange light (similar to street lamps) with no accompanying sound traveling Northwest then turning more West.  As they turned the light faded, but a grey outline could still be made out against the sky. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: 09/23/2012 in florida 8:30pm driving in my car spotted a red ball of fire floating in the sky,looked like it was coming toward the grou
records.story: 09/23/2012 in florida 8:30pm driving in my car spotted a red ball of fire floating in the sky, looked like it was coming toward the ground  and floated back up in the sky and  disappeared. tried to show it to a lady but it was over some trees,and they could'nt see it.

records.summary: 3 bright red lights over tampa
records.story: 3 bright red lights over tampa Looked up Northeast in the sky and I noticed 2 bright red objects moving South, I knew it couldn't have been an airplane or helicopter because of how slow they were going.  And about 10 seconds after I initially saw the first 2 a third one appeared.  Same red bright light as the first 2.  They were hoovering a little bit and once the cloud cover came they "dimmed" out, like as a light goes out.

records.summary: My dad is retired pilot from the military, we look out the window and all of sudden see tons of tinny lights people walking outside all
records.story: My dad is retired pilot from the military, we look out the window and all of sudden see tons of tinny lights people walking outside all stop too and we are all looking in shock what it is.   My dad has never seen anything in his entire life and time flying seen any formation of air crafts like that! We have pictures also!  I never believed in aliens or something till tonight makes me wander. Some were close together some far apart all flying same way and go into a cloud and disappear 20 or 30 of them!  My dad says the weather and cloud probably means the flew up and away because they never flew out from behind the cloud.

records.summary: A cross shaped glowing figure fell at a rapid speed from the sky shortly after midnight.
records.story: A cross shaped glowing figure fell at a rapid speed from the sky shortly after midnight. A cross shaped object, bright white in color, fell directly down from the sky at a rapid rate.   This was in the vicinity of Tampa International Airport, but was definitely not a plane.  We live due south of the airport and this figure was moving at a much greater speed than any plane I have ever seen and was fully lit, not point lights at various locations like a plane.   When it was within a couple hundred feet above ground level, it just disappeared.   I waited for a crash, but heard nothing.  The cross-like figure had both axes of equal length.  There was a curved structure connecting the lower leading vertical axis to the lateral axis.  We have lived at this house for seven years and see air traffic all the time.  I am a licensed architect who studied engineering and I have never seen anything of this nature.  The weather was partly cloudy with a temperature of 80 degrees Fahrenheit.  There was a large, nearly perfectly round cloud where the object began wi! th winds heading East at 3mph at the time of the event.

records.summary: A fiery round craft headed north at low altitude followed by an identical craft a few seconds behind.
records.story: A fiery round craft headed north at low altitude followed by an identical craft a few seconds behind. At 11:40pm on Dec 24 , my brother , girlfriend , neighbor and I saw a fiery orange round craft moving due north about a quarter to half a mile away at low altitude followed by another identical craft following the same path about 10 to 15 seconds behind the first one.   As I was focused on the closer second craft, my brother was still watching the first one as was getting smaller the further it went away and he witnessed it discontinue its straight, level, silent, consistent flight and quickly shoot up and out of sight.  These were fiery orange pinkish round on the top with 2 illuminated "legs" hanging beneath the craft.  It seemed they were about 15 to 20 feet in diameter and moving about 50 to 80 mph  level about 300 to 500 ft altitude until they dashed away at extremely high speed.  Oddly enough ,a couple months ago, I witnessed a similarly colored larger ufo on Oct 18 also at exactly 11:40 pm.

records.summary: Two fire ball like flying objects seen following each other in Tampa On Christmas Eve
records.story: Two fire ball like flying objects seen following each other in Tampa On Christmas Eve 2 objects that looked like Orange fireballs in color, flying parallel to the earth, but within the Earth's atmosphere.  Sighting was observed by 4 individuals at about 11:40 pm, on Christmas Eve, and lasted about 1 min in duration.  The first object seemed to have two small lights below it and toward the end of the sighting seemed to speed off vertically.  The second was only a few seconds behind the first object and were seen following one another.  Both objects made no noise.

records.summary: Zig Zagging Star Over Tampa Florida
records.story: Zig Zagging Star Over Tampa Florida Mc Donalds Christmas nightime party.  Upper deck 1975.  Witness was an Airforce personnel who worked part time named Luis I believe.   We saw a triangular bright looking star and watched it go straight, zig zag, zooming up and down.  I asked him is that a new air craft on Mc Dill AFB?  He said no!  A plane or craft we have cannot move like that.  No one was on the rooftop but us at that time so he told me never to tell because people would think we were nuts.  He had his career to think about.   I will never forget it.  I was about 16 or so I believe.  I am now getting up in age so I want it known and wonder if any other people living in Tampa saw this?  We could not have been the only ones. It looked like a star it was so bright and high in the sky.  He said this thing must be larger than what we were seeing!  Just need someone to know this information in case anything ever happens to me. ((NUFORC Note:  Date above is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: LOW FLYING UFO STOPPED IN MID AIR OVER TAMPA, FL.  THEN VANISHED!
records.story: ON 12/31/2012 AT 23:32 LOW FLYING UFO STOPPED IN MID AIR OVER TAMPA,FL.  THEN VANISHED! ON NEW YEARS EVE I WALK INTO MY BACK YARD AT 23:32,  AS IT SOUNDED LIKE A WAR ZONE. I SAW FIRE WORKS IN THE NIGHT SKY. THE SHY WAS PARTLY CLOUDY TOWARDS THE SOUTH SKY AND CLEAR TOWARDS THE NORTH SKY. TOWARDS THE SOUTH SKY I NOTICE A RED LIGHT TRAVELING FROM SOUTH TO NORTH ACROSS THE SKY. AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS JUST A FIRE WORK GETTING READY TO EXPLODE, AS ALL THE OTHERS DID. HOWEVER, AS I KEPT MY SIGHT ON THE RED LIGHT, IT DID NOT EXPLODE. INSTEAD THE LIGHT TRAVELED SLOWLY ACROSS THE NIGHT SKY. AS IT FLEW CLOSER I SAW A CRAFT WITH THREE RED LIGHTS THAT WERE NOT FLASHING. AS IT TRAVELED JUST BELOW CLOUD LEVEL, THE LIGHTS LITE UP THE CLOUD ABOVE IT WITH A RED GLOW. I RAN IN THE OFFICE TO GRAB MY BINOCULARS (8X42). WITHIN 30 SECONDS I RETURNED TO MY BACK YARD, THE CRAFT WAS STILL FLYING SLOWLY ACROSS THE SKY AND WAS STILL UNDER THE CLOUD. SO I STARTED VEIWING IT WITH MY BINOCULARS AND CLEARLY SAW THREE RED LIGHTS, ONE ON THE TOP CENTER, AND ONE ON FRONT AND B! ACK. THE CRAFT APPEARED TO HAVE A GRAY METAL COLOR. ONCE IT WAS NO LONGER UNDER THE CLOUD THE SKY BACKGROUND WAS A CLEAR STAR LITE SKY. THE CRAFT LOOKED TO BE ABOUT 1000 FEET UP IN THE AIR AS IT TRAVELED NORTH A SHORT DISTANCE THEN CAME TO A COMPLETE STOP. THERE WAS NOT ANY NOISE COMING FROM THE CRAFT. IT STOPPED IN MID AIR FOR ABOUT 20 SECONDS. THEN THE CRAFT TOOK OFF FLYING FROM A DEAD STOP, TO A VERY HIGH RATE OF SPEED AT ABOUT A 45 DEGREE ANGLE TOWARD THE NORTHWEST SKY DIRECTION. THE CRAFT TRAVELED SO FAST THAT IT'S RED LIGHTS VANISHED INTO THE STAR LITE SKY IN UNDER 10 SECONDS.

records.summary: Orange orb about 1/2 mile up. Traveled in a straight line N to S about a minute then faded out. Not a plane. No flashing lights.
records.story: Orange orb about 1/2 mile up. Traveled in a straight line N to S about a minute then faded out.  Not a plane. No flashing lights or noise.  I saw a similar orange orb last year near St Pete Beach, 8 witnesses. I have seen meteors several times, this was not one.

records.summary: Intensely bright light sphere high up in the sky over the Gulf of Mexico.
records.story: Intensely bright light sphere high up in the sky over the Gulf of Mexico When leaving USF Tampa campus and heading West on Fowler road, I saw a extremely bright light sphere in the sky about ~30 degrees South when facing West.  I watch carefully. I got on to I-275 Southbound and it remained there in the sky all the way home.  IT WAS STILL DAYLIGHT!  No stars visible and planes do not fly this high up...planes were flying in the sky at the same time as for a good scale.  When I got home in south Tampa, it was just getting dark and it was still there, really bright like as if a flashlight was pointing at my face (it wasn't not a flashlight, just to be clear!)  I waited outside until my girlfriend got home and I made her look at it.  She said "WOW!" She then pulled out her "Google stars and sky map"  (The one that shows you stars, planets, and constellations), she thought it was the planet Venus.  However, I doubt that. I thought maybe the International space station, but doubt that too because of how bright it was.  I then went inside for the night.

records.summary: 3 flat, black, disc shapes w/lights descending rapidly over interstate in FL, looked like a flares or rockets.
records.story: 3 flat, black, disc shapes w/lights descending rapidly over interstate in FL, looked like a flares or rockets. Tonight while driving Eastbound on I-275 from Clearwater to Tampa, myself, fiancé & daughter were in vehicle and I noticed a flashing white & red light descending rapidly in the sky.  First thought it was an airplane or a Chinese lantern, but when it started getting lower thought it was possibly a life flight helicopter.  It descended straight down rapidly at a 45 degree angle, almost like a flare from a flare gun.  It stopped blinking and began pulsating - we tried to slow the vehicle down to take photos but couldn't get a clear shot. There is a large blue water tower on the left side of the highway - between the Ybor City exit and the I-4 interchange - and when we began driving past it I started screaming "what is it". It was a flat black and round (as if you'd lay a car tire on its side) with one large round blinking white light on the left, and two large round red lights in the right side. It was near the same size AS the water tower so I was surprised nobody else could see it, it was VERY large.  My daughter began crying and we couldn't find an exit to turn around to look for it.  The craft came straight down, and literally STOPPED beside the water tower, it was hovering beside it.  That's when I started panicking because if it was an airplane, it was close enough to crash into the tower.  It was not a small engine plane as it had NO wings at all. Just a large black round & disc shaped with the 3 lights.  It made absolutely no noise, and when we started passing it, it very rapidly rotated out of sight to the right side, back behind the water tower. About a half hour later, we drove to the roof of the parking garage (5th floor) at the Hard Rock Casino in Tampa to see if maybe we could be high enough to see it or take a picture, but only had cell phones and the video was poor quality.  My fiancé stood on the hood of my car and I was just outside the car, and there were two more of the identical craft, approximately 1000 feet away - but these ones were ascending straight up.  Not at an angle at all, not very fast.  The same 1 white light and 2 red ones on each. I have never seen anything like this before in my life, I'm still really shaken at how close they were.

records.summary: Orange circles  with many smaller circles within them .... changing to white random shapes.
records.story: Orange circles  with many smaller circles within them .... changing to white random shapes Round orange glowing things above Tampa Bay seen from the opposite side (town of Rankin.. I think I have the name right)  They were hovering above the bay moving very slowly.  They would change from a near-perfect orange circle with smaller concentric circles within it to a bright white random shape (a blurry white shape), and then back to the orange circle. They didn't make any sound but we may have been too far away to hear anything. My wife and I saw them walking back to the hotel room over the Bay (there hadn't been any lights there any other night so they caught our attention). We got back to the room and went on the balcony and filmed them.  I wanted to send the footage to MUFON but the file is too large for me to email (it was in high def)  It is a bit shaky in parts but pretty good with some good close-ups. Maybe it was helicopters looking for someone in the bay...We dont know what they were but we still think about this a year later. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: 5 crafts spotted in Tampa.
records.story: 5 crafts spotted in Tampa I noticed a really bright star when I was on my back porch.  As I was enjoying the perfect night, the star began to move slowly, almost floating along in mostly straight line.  Then I noticed very unreal types of movement.  Almost as if the craft was dancing in the air like a knuckleball. I continued to stare for more than an hour hoping it would come closer so I could get a better look.  Tried to get media of thus event but was too far away.   Within that hour 4 more crafts were seen at about the same distance with identical movements.  At one point I was able to see the one vessel emit other colors like orange and blue.  All 5 seemed very  far away.   Out of nowhere, clouds filled the sky and I could no longer see them.

records.summary: I have a UFO picture in my camera.
records.story: I have a UFO picture in my camera. Saturday, January 26, 2013. I was taking pictures to the full moon late in the afternoon today after the Gasparilla parade at Ballast Point Park near the bay of Tampa, Fl.  It was about 7:15 pm. The first picture I took I felt like an excessive flashing like.  It showed a disc shape object over the sea in the bay.  I shoot my camera twice more but it was nothing. I saw nothing with my eyes but the image was in my camera.  The disc looks like a coin with relief details in the surface. It is clear without the zoom. It was big taking the moon as referenced in the picture, but I cannot tell about the size.  It looks silver and bright in the image.  I was shock after I realized what it was in my camera.  A was with a friend of mine who saw my reaction.  The sky was clear and there was no noises. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: String of blinking red light aircraft.
records.story: String of Blinking red light aircraft My wife called me in a panick and said come out quickly and look up.   I came at on this clear night and saw a string of red blinking lights on aircraft that were high up in the sky moving fast from north to south.  It was approximately 8-10 aircraft.  They were going northeast to Southwest.   After a awhile, we weren't able to see them any longer.  The whole event lasted for about 3-4 minutes.

records.summary: 7-8 orange lights 3/8/2014 over Tampa.
records.story: 7-8 orange lights 3/8/2014 over Tampa There were approximately 8 orange lights moving southbound over the Carrollwood Citrus Park area.  No particular formation.  No particular order.  No flashing or blinking lights.  All uniform in color.   I have lived in the area for years.  This was not an aircraft headed to TIA.  Smallish in size.  The shape was probably round. It was about 9:30pm. We were in the parking lot at the Pizza Place near Sheldon and Citrus Park drive.  Four members of my family, and about six members of the other party.  Both groups questioned what the light were.  Some jokingly called the Home Depot buckets.

records.summary: Glowing purple sphere remained stationary and then moved up and down until disappeared below tree line.
records.story: Glowing purple sphere remained stationary and then moved up and down until disappeared below tree line Viewed from a condo balcony in town n country that overlooks Tampa from the NE edge of Tampa Bay.  5-10 miles off in the distance to the ESE was a glowing purple sphere that appeared to stay stationary hovering in the sky and then go up and down until it lowered below the tree line.  It re-emerged later after midnight doing the same thing for another 10 minutes.  It was somewhere between the TIA airport and Ybor City.  Fireworks were going off around it for New Year's Eve but it did not seem impacted by them and it was unclear how close it was to the fireworks due to the distance.  5 people on my balcony witnessed it as did several people on a neighbor's balcony.

records.summary: Glowing hoop.
records.story: Over our house, we saw a UFO that looked like it was changing colors and it was flying over between 30 minutes to an hour.   It was shaped like a circle with lights all around the perimeter.  It looked like a glowing hoop.

records.summary: Orange lights in the sky.
records.story: Orange lights in the sky. Eight orange spheres in sky over Tampa.

records.summary: On Tuesday 2/18/2014 on or about 9:46 am while standing on my front porch me and my nephew were observing this  commercial southwest ai
records.story: On Tuesday, 2/18/2014, on or about 9:46 am, while standing on my front porch, me and my nephew were observing this commercial southwest airplane on landing approach.  A black round object dropped from the bottom of the aircraft.  The object dropped about 300 feet from the plane and continued flying vertical ((Correction:  horizontally)) following the direction of the plane towards the airport.  As it was getting closer to our direction we noticed a bubble like clear sphere and the black round object in the middle.  The episode lasted at least 3 minutes until we could not see the object any more.

records.summary: Orange and red pulsating ball traverses a small portion of the sky and vanishes
records.story: Orange and red pulsating ball traverses a small portion of the sky and vanishes I observed this object in the North West sky for approximately a minute before it flickered and vanashed.  The object glowed an orange and red color and there was no trail preceding.  This is a clear night and there are no clouds.  Speed and size of the object could not be determined; however, there were man made aircraft visible and the radiating light from those appeared significantly smaller.  Could this have been a satellite?

records.summary: UFO spotted from a distance, round or almost pear/diamond shaped object, white in color, and absolutely no sound came from it.
records.story: UFO spotted from a distance, round or almost pear/diamond shaped object, white in color, and absolutely no sound came from it. I was on my front porch this laying on my lounge chair facing the sky,  I saw a small circular disk snapped object that was white in color blending with the clouds as it silently traveled southbound from my view.  I'm use to jets, helicopters, and airplanes in the area most can be detected by their distinct noise trails, but this object was completely silent!  The size appeared small due to the distance I presume it had no smoke trail it flew perfectly straight at a speed that does mimic some known aircrafts but did not have the shape of know air vehicles.  fter the object passed maybe about five minutes later a jet passed in the same spot, but the jet was easily recognizable! It had a sound trail and that infamous white tail is smoke a little ways behind it, minutes after the first jet I saw another jet with the same features as the first one heading in the exact same direction of the UFO, as if the jet was going after the unidentified object, I video tapped th! e sy right after the UFO was spotted, I was so shocked, I've never seen anything like that before today!!!

records.summary: Weird brownish manmade looking object in sky.
records.story: weird brownish manmade looking object in sky I was on my way home after taking kids to school.  At the redlight i happened to look up at the birds in the sky when i noticed this weird looking object it almost looked like a manmade plane but i could not see anyone on it looked like it couldve been brown in color and maybe the size of a dune buggy.  It moved quickly in a matter of a minute it had already moved to the next block did not hear no sound but i did see a quick flash or reflection off the object seemed like it got closer to land as if searching for something then it would go back up.  A weird experience it almost seemed like i was the only one paying attention during everyones morning commute .before reaching home object was still in the air. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: On my drive home I was looking into an otherwise clear sky, with the exception of what I thought was a plane.  I watched the plane with
records.story: On my drive home I was looking into an otherwise clear sky, with the exception of what I thought was a plane.  I watched the plane with twinkling lights sit high in the sky for about two minutes.  Then the lights were gone without warning.   I continued to search the sky and the craft was completely gone. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Fireballs over Carlton Arms North.
records.story: Fireballs over Carlton Arms North This object at first was thought to be a rocket launch from the cape.  Moving straight up from the east.   It then came toward me in a westerly direction.  At that time, it appeared as two fireballs side by side. I ran into the apartment and got my wife to go out front of the apartment with me.  She and I watched as she dialed 911 to tell them of a possible aircraft on fire.   We watched this object turn northwest, and then due north, out of our sight.  Duration was approximately 3-4 minutes.

records.summary: 2 Glowing green boomerang-shaped objects at 5000 feet, moving extremely fast.
records.story: 2 Glowing green boomerang shaped objects at 5000 feet, moving extremely fast on the smoking deck, airside E tampa airport, several of us saw a silver kids like helium ballon drift across the sky.   As we were looking up, two green glowing boomerang shaped objects in line about 1000 yards apart shot across our field of view, directly over the airport tower at what we estimated to be around 5000 feet, NE to SW, headed directly toward macdill airforce base.  we estimated the speed at 5 or 6000 MPH. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Red and white lights over Tampa, Fl.
records.story: Red and white lights over Tampa, Fl. I was outside, on the phone with a friend, and saw an object in the sky.   I initially thought it was a plane. It was slowly swaying across the sky in a pattern that was unlike a plane or helicopter.   The night was cloudy.  I could barely see the moon, and no stars.  It was definitely beneath the cloud coverage.   It had one red light and two white lights.  It moved from the east (from the furthest possible point I could see) to west, then hovered in the western sky.   I looked at it though binoculars, but could see no definition or shape; the lights were clearer.  I ran inside to wake my wife.  She came out and was unimpressed, until it turned a much brighter red (the white lights either turned off or were overshadowed by the red lights) and quickly descended, swaying downward.   Due to trees blocking my vision, I'm not sure what happened after.

records.summary: Standing in the backyard and two massive blue lights lit up northern sky.. Seemed like it started from the ground up, to large to be a
records.story: Standing in the backyard and two massive blue lights lit up northern sky..   Seemed like it started from the ground up, to large to be a transformer.. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: It looks like light behind a mesh, moving slow or even hovering as the earth spins. I've been sitting on my balcony watching it w binoc
records.story: It looks like light behind a mesh, moving slow or even hovering as the earth spins.   I've been sitting on my balcony watching it w/ binoculars for over an hour. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: We saw 4 orange round ufos near each other and 3 more orange ufos flying toward them. We did not hear any engine noise.
records.story: We saw 4 orange round ufos near each other and 3 more orange ufos flying toward them.  We did not hear any engine noise.

records.summary: Strange light falling from the sky, and aircraft chasing it.  ((NUFORC Note:  Photo appears to show contrails behind a/c.  PD))
records.story: Strange light falling from the sky, and aircraft chasing it. Whatever was falling from the sky was falling, leaving a trail of cloud or smoke.  I saw a really bright oddly shaped cloud that was kind of hook shaped, then I noticed it was getting longer but fixed in the sky.  It kept getting longer.  And I realized whatever it was, it was falling.   Then I see a jet make a large circle and head toawards it and i saw and additional 3 aircrafts flight in from the north chasing it and i followed them as best i could but they disappeared in the horizon  with the sunset and traffic.  They were chasing whatever was falling from the sky torward the east of where i was.  Oh and as i got closer to what i originally throught was a very bright oddly shaped cloud in the distance it was very cloud looking but the trail it left as it was falling to the ground was pretty fixed. ((NUFORC Note:  Photo appears to show contrails behind a/c.  PD))

records.summary: It was 8:00 pm as a family member proceeded to call out my name with a bit of wary,  it wasnt till i stepped out my house and looked up
records.story: It was 8:00 pm as a family member proceeded to call out my name with a bit of wary,  it wasnt till i stepped out my house and looked up and there it was, a what looked like a fireball.  But it was stilled as in waiting!  For?  Then proceeded to leave heading west bound, i drew what it looked like.  It was metalic with 4 sharp edges and what looked like a fireball in the middle.

records.summary: Shiny silver flat fast pace.
records.story: Shiny silver flat fast pace In sky near Bush Gardens traveling east to west   We were eon Bush Blvd off 275. It was very shinny and silver.   To me it had pointed nose, flat body flying low to clouds.  Grandson saw shiny, silver, flat disc flying low to clouds.   It was about noon or before.  We both saw it at same time shouting!   This was in Tampa FL.

records.summary: Shiny silver disc traveling at a fast pace on the outskirt of the clouds with grandson in Tampa, FL.
records.story: Shiny silver disc traveling at a fast pace on the outskirt of the clouds with grandson in Tampa, FL. The object was seen at noon time in the sky.  It was a very shiny silver in color.   It looked to be 1/2 the circumference of the sun.  The object was moving north as we were traveling on W. Bush Blvd.   The object was with the horizon of the clouds flying low yet most of the craft was in the clouds as it traveled.   I only saw one side of the object which was flat, disc shape and a dolphin like nose. It was traveling at a high speed and stayed within the clouds.  I only saw it for maybe 15 seconds then it was gone into the clouds.  This object was so shiny and silver like it had just been polished.   My grandson also saw it and he was the first to notice.   I e-mailed the Tampa Tribune requesting an answer if any person had reported the sighting.

records.summary: Circular object that hovered and moved with red and green flashing lights.
records.story: Circular object that hovered and moved with red and green flashing lights. The object we saw was for  circular with red lights flashing when moving.  When stationary green lights blinked around the red lights.  We discussed what this could have possibly have been.   My son thought some kind of RC toy but my husband,  daughter and I thought too high up and no noise.  We thought some kind of drone or experimental craft out of McDill AFB but not quite sure what to make of it.   My daughter ran to get a camera and binoculars but the object had left our viewing area by the time she returned.

records.summary: After taking the picture , my camera time display reads 2033.
records.story: After taking the picture, my camera time display reads 2033. On 2-28-15 I noticed some lights around the moon.  I took my digital camera, and zoomed in and took a picture. About a week later, I downloaded it to my PC.  It had more detail than I thought. I am not sure what it is.  I just want someone else to look at it, and see what they think. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Metallic Pyramid like object seen over Tampa Florida Downtown in daylight.
records.story: Metalic Pyramid like object seen over Tampa Florida Downtown in daylight. I'm a 31 year old female.  I Spotted a highly reflective, metallic pyramid like object hovering around the Hotel Floridan in day light at Tampa Downtown.  Appeared to be 5x5 feet in height and width.   The object rotated slowly showing it's flat metallic surfaces, reflecting the sun on its panels.  I watched it slowly move down from the sky in the distance towards the building 15 floors up from my apartment.   At first I thought it was a helicopter but as it got closer, I noticed it looked nothing like it.  I then tried to see if it was a balloon.  But when I saw it move in a zig zag movement going up, down, left and right, I scratched that idea too.  I watched it move up and down along the building and then quickly move off into the horizon, changing its speed as it eventually zipped upwards into the sky.  I'm hoping other's saw this object too. Very strange. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Red and cobalt blue pulsing light seen moving quickly across sky above Gandy Bridge, Flying southeast toward MacDill AFB.

records.summary: 3 Reddish-orange lights in a triangle moving over New Tampa
records.story: 3 Reddish-orange lights in a triangle moving over New Tampa. While sitting in our driveway at the end of a cul-de-sac which backs up to a wooded area, we were roasting marshmallows at 9:30 p.m., when we noticed in the sky three reddish-orange lights in a triangular pattern moving very slowly across the sky.   They seemed to appear suddenly out of nowhere.  We watched the object move north to south and all 3 lights started to dim and the light at the front vertice of the triangle was the last one to go out.  It never returned.

records.summary: At approximately 11:30 pm, I saw 5 orange/red sphere (or firebalks) slowly moving from north to south accross the eastern sky
records.story: At approximately 11:30 pm, I saw 5 orange/red sphere (or firebalks) slowly moving from north to south accross the eastern sky Late Tuesday night, July 21, 2015, around 11:30 pm to 11:45 pm I arrived home and got out of my car and across the field above the tree line in the low to mid part of the night sky I saw  five orange/red spherical/oval lights slowly moving across the eastern sky  from what seemed like a south to north direction. These lights were more or less in a line stretching  about a fourth of the way across the sky as I watched them slowly move southward.  They were not tightly spaced but had about same space between them: K One........Two.......Three/ Four (these two were one above the other with roughly the same ....... spacing, and seemed to be trying to get closer to each other) then........Five. They must have not been that far away from me because they were quite bright and bigger than stars. I don't know where they came from I just saw them there in that line slowly moving north. At a certain point (which oddly corresponds to where the visibility from my vantage point is unobstructed when  looking at that part of the sky), the light of first object suddenly went dark, and after that when each of those objects reached that part of the sky they too sent dark. It seems that they may have continued on but moving east now ( but I could not be certain).This sighting occurred in Tampa, but in the Temple Terrace/Thontosassa area. These objects moved slowly, and I estimate I watched this for at least three minutes. I wondered if anyone else saw them? As watched it felt almost like they were putting on a show just for me as it took so long. I looked on-line, and it may be possible they were some sort of sky lanterns ( Chinese lanterns) as they are that color and move slowly. I can't be certain. I did not hear of any being launched. But it is a possibility. I always look up at the night sky and have never seen anything like what I saw ever before. However, there was a night  in the  summer  of 2009 in which I saw on roughly that same area of the sky  where the lights went off  in last nights sighting; a strangely churning white cloud ( at night).  I remember because I have NEVER seen a cloud churn and billow so fast.  On that night I got a chill because I was driving home listening to a man tell a story about Moses and the cloud appearing in the mountain, when, as I pulled into my driveway, I saw this strangely churning cloud directly in my line of vision.  It was late at night also and the synchronicity of what I saw  and heard made me run for cover inside my house. So for me, I guess,  that area of sky is indeed mysterious.  I softened wondered if behind that churning cloud was a mother ship.  Odd that the lights should disappear when they got to that part of the sky...

records.summary: There were two bright circular objects in the direction of Tampa International.  ((NUFORC Note:  Venus & Jupiter?  PD))
records.story: There were two bright circular objects (I live in north Tampa and the objects were in the direction of Tampa International Airport) that I thought were stars because they did not move for over 30 mins then all of a sudden they slowly moved north.  At this time I thought they were still stars or planets in the sky.  They were abnormally bright but then in an instant the one object that was further ways slowly faded away then the other.   I was on the phone at the time looking at these objects and that is when things got weird.  When these seemed to be "star like objects" kept disappearing and fading away then coming back I knew it was was not a star or plane.  I could see planes landing and taking off in and around these objects.  But these objects would stay in one spot for several minutes then fade away and show up in slightly a different spot stay still then get brighter the fade again.  These were definitely not planes.  And not drones because they faded way too fast and seemed to hover then me then disappear all in an instant. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Two tennis players witness two bright objects in the morning sky.
records.story: While Playing Tennis in South Tampa, Florida It's Friday May 29, 2015 around 10 am, and my tennis partner and I are playing singles at Cal Dickson Tennis Center in South Tampa.  We are the only ones there.   It's 3 to 3 in the second set, add out and I'm serving from North to South.  I'm serving a second serve.  My service toss is in an area directly above my head as I face West.  I tilt my head up as I look at the area in the sky where I want to toss the ball into.   I look up an toss the ball and stop.  Directly in the area that I'm tossing the ball I see a object every high in the sky reflecting the light from the sun.   I say to my partner look at that and point.  He can't see it.  So I go over to his side of the court next to him and point at the object in the sky.  It's stationary and metallic reflecting the light from the sun, which at 10am is south east.  He sees it and we stare transfixed.  He sees a second similar object higher in the sky that I can't see. The object stayed in this area for around 5 or more minutes and then either left or disappeared.  We just couldn't see it anymore. Cal Dickson Tennis Center is around six miles North of U.S. Central Command MacDill Air Force Base in South Tampa. My partner and I resumed playing tennis and shortly thereafter a military helicopter, (long and silver), appeared in the sky near where the object was that we sighted, but lower.  The helicopter stayed stationary in the sky till around 11am.  And numerous military aircraft with contrails appeared patrolling flying very high in the sky near where the object was sighted.  These aircraft were many times higher in the sky than the helicopter. My partner and I have been playing tennis at the Cal Dickson Tennis Center three times a week on weekday mornings for over two years and are familiar with the aircraft flying over the area.  Tampa International Airport is around five miles northwest of the Cal Dickson Tennis Center. Occasionally, traffic, news and police helicopters appear over the area of the Cal Dickson Tennis Center.  But these helicopters are always east, southeast, northwest over land.  The unidentified flying object we saw was West of us out over the bay.

records.story: A thunderstorm was coming in from the east off MacDill Air Force Base looked up and saw a red and yellow - green round object move down toward the water came back up hovered then went toward the Southwest, and then it was gone.

records.summary: Odd football shaped object seen from Dale Mabry Highway in Tampa, traveling near airliner.
records.story: Odd football shaped object seen from Dale Mabry Highway in Tampa, traveling near airliner. At approximately 2:30, in the afternoon on 05/06/15, I was heading south on Dale Mabry Highway near the Northdale Drive area.  The sky was overcast in patchy sections where there were areas of clear sky between the clouds.  Cloud ceiling looked to be around 6-7000 feet.   I glanced up at an airliner that was making an approach to Tampa Int'l Airport, traveling on a SSW heading.  I estimate the aircraft's altitude at about 3,500-4000 feet.  As I watched the airliner, I spotted another object drop out of the clouds above and slightly in front of the airliner.  The object was shaped like a football with the ends more narrowly pinched together.  It was uniformly gray in color.   It described a smooth arc downward for maybe 500' or so, then pulled up and into the next cloud bank.  The sighting lasted only a few seconds, but the object was clearly visible, and I could see the airplane and the object together.  I would estimate the object to be slightly smaller than the airliner so perhaps 100' long.  It had no wings, engines or other visible characteristics or marking.   Its movement was very smooth and fluid.  I'm not sure if anyone on the aircraft was in a position to see the object as it was almost directly above them and perhaps 1000-2000 feet higher.   When the object ducked back into the clouds, I continued driving south in hopes I might see it again but it did not reappear.  Not sure what it was but very unusual looking and appeared to be controlled.  It was moving slightly faster than the aircraft so maybe around 200-250 knots.   I am something of an aviation buff but this did not resemble any aircraft that I know of.

records.summary: Two bright orange lights traveling northeast over Tampa, Fl.
records.story: Two bright orange lights traveling northeast over Tampa, Fl. The objects observed were two bright orange lights(orbs) high in the night sky traveling in unison in a northeast direction, one above the other.  After approximately five minutes the objects disappeared.  First the bottom one and then the top one.  Throughout the sighting there was no sound.  One of the photos shows two lights but when enhanced two silver objects can clearly be seen. The event was witnessed by myself, a retired USAF airborne intelligence NCO/retired deputy sheriff and my daughter also former USAF NCO/deputy sheriff plus my grandson and friend.

records.summary: I was in a parking lot close to Waters Ave. and Anderson Rd facing E, 1 mile North of Tampa International Airport. ((anon.))
records.story: I was in a parking lot, close to Waters Ave. and Anderson Rd., facing East, one mile North of Tampa International Airport.   The air traffic is always heavy but has its dull moments.  During a slow moment of air traffic I saw what I thought it first to be a flock of birds in a wedge or chevron formation.  Within a second or two I realized it was not birds.  It was a fuzzy, white mist like boomerang with the ends of the leading edges curved inward like a comma.  I tried to pull my phone out of my pocket for a picture but couldn't take my eyes off of it.  As it passed to the south, I had to jog to the north in the parking lot.  I was losing my line of sight for the warehouse roof to my right/south, but still didn't get a picture. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Large bright white/blue orb or saucer hovering in the sky.  ((NUFORC Note:  Sighting of Sirius??  PD))
records.story: Large bright white/blue orb or saucer hovering in the sky Driving down the crosstown in Tampa.  As I looked over to the right, I noticed a pretty large sized oval/saucer like object floating in the sky.  I was headed east on the crosstown going towards downtown Tampa and the object was floating to the north of my location.   I have to say, I almost ran off the road because I was staring at this object, trying to figure out what it really was.  It was a very bright white/light blue orb/saucer just hoovering over the suburbs.  I was able to take photos of the object and after reviewing them on my phone, it was pretty clear that whatever this object might have been could move or switch locations in literally a blink of an eye.   3 photos were taken within 1 second of each other, and after comparing them side by side you can clearly see just how quickly the object switched locations.  The crosstown provides and elevated view of the surrounding suburbs, so I had a great view of the object.   Someone else had to have seen this, ther! e is no way I would have been the only one.  If this object is something our government has created, then props to them because it is definitely beyond our time. ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect a sighting of Sirius.  PD))

records.summary: Silver, oval shaped craft flying over the bay with 2 dark spots like viewing portals and antenna like cylinders.
records.story: Silver, oval shaped craft flying over the bay with 2 dark spots like viewing portals and antenna like cylinders. In the early evening (sunset over the Hillsborough Bay, of June 2015, I took this picture with my Android as I was driving over the Gandy Bridge, Tampa Florida.  The sky caught my attention because of the way the clouds looked and the sunset.  Did not notice the craft (UFO) in the sky at the time.  I was driving 55 mph and just snapped it quickly. I just noticed the (UFO) craft in the sky today, January 18, 2016, when I was looking through photo’s in my Florida library media. I can’t believe what I zoomed in on when I noticed the dark oval craft in the picture in the upper right corner of my Photo.  This craft and looks like 2 other very small black images near it of an odd shape, but my camera did not depict their design. Hope this photo can be analyzed well with the photo I have sent and someone has some idea what this craft is.  Definitely not a jet.  I am still amazed and curious about this craft (UFO) and look forward to reading about my photo on your site in the near future and what on earth it is. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Large light formation South Tampa, near MacDill AFB.
records.story: Large light formation South Tampa, near MacDill AFB. At about 9:30 p.m. when he witnessed a strange light in the sky.  There was about 11 of us who witnessed it.  It was a large white light that hovered about 45 minutes, and then disappeared within a split second.   I live within a half a mile from MacDill Air Force Base, so I've heard of UFO sightings near bases.  This is the first time I have witnessed this.   I have also witnessed another UFO sighting when I was about 9 years old.  I am now 43.  I don't remember too much of the details on that sighting.

records.summary: Fireballs flying in formation outside Tampa.
records.story: Fireballs flying in formation outside Tampa. I had just got done eating at Boston Market because I did not feel like cooking.  As I was walking out towards my car.  I saw two orange fireballs flying in V-shaped formation, then disappearing.  I could been less then 1-2 miles away if that.   So I decided to keep driving, then I saw only one just hovering and pulsating at a distance as I was driving out of Tampa going north.  So I decided to turn around and it was gone when I tried to pull over. This particular area is directly in the middle approach path of Tampa International Airport runways 16L and 16R.  There had to be more then just one person who had to have seen this.  At first I thought they might of been helicopters or fighter jets.  But I ruled that out because I've seen many aircraft land and neither of them were bright orange as the two objects I saw

records.summary: Bright red/pink lights hovering over Tampa; appearing ascending high up and disappearing only to repeat pattern 3-4 times
records.story: Bright red/pink lights hovering over Tampa; appearing ascending high up and disappearing only to repeat pattern 3-4 times In our apartment complex, going to walk the dog for the last time before bed.  Looking south, over what would be the Wal-Mart area near Gunn Highway, we thought what a very bright red star.  Amazing to see such a close bright vibrant red star, and somewhat next to it was a red star nearly as bright and also seemingly closer to the Earth too.  Then the brighter of the two just started rising high up into the sky.  Once it got extremely high it would seem like just another hard to see star.  It would flash a time or two and then disappear.  Then the other star next to it moved off to left of it in a westerly direction, and slowly started to move high up into the sky just as the first one did, and then it did the same thing.  It just blinked out.  As soon as it did, another very bright red star popped into existence low into the sky and just sat there, still, not moving.  After about 5-10 seconds, it repeated what it had done before, just as it would be ready to blink out from being seen (it would reach a high level in the sky and then stop; and then vanish from being seen), there would appear a super vibrant red light down low in the sky and this pattern repeated again and again for 3-4 cycles.  We stopped to watch this in complete awe, and then after watching it for 5 minutes, it all just stopped.  About 3 minutes later, 2 very bright red lights/sphere just appeared high in the sky, but relatively low (like when the GoodYear Blimp is very high up, but comparatively low in relation to clouds/stars).  We had a great look at the brilliance of these two relatively close red lights, but then honestly we became a little nervous.  It was just me, the wife, and the dog.  I am a lawyer.  These stories about visits and encounters always seem to end poorly for humans, and it was uncharacteristically quiet for our apartment complex in terms of there being little people traffic/movement at 1am on a Saturday night.

records.summary: Triangular object spotted over Tampa  5/26/16  9:30 pm.
records.story: Triangular object spotted over Tampa  5/26/16  9:30 pm Noticed a bright light at 9:30 pm EST.  Traveling from S.W to N.E. over my house in Carrollwood area of Tampa.  There were no clouds and the night sky was clear and stars were all visible.  It appeared at first like a moving star.   I thought it might be a plane but noticed no blinking lights.  It wasn't moving very fast and as it got closer (more directly over head) I noticed 3 straight illuminated lines that formed a triangle surrounding the bright star like point of light in the center of the object.  The lines that formed the triangular border where white in color and the central single light was more yellowish white.   I tried to take some pictures with my cell phone, but could not get any in focus to show the shape of the object.   My wife came out and saw it as well.   It continued on a straight N.E heading and seemed to pick up speed as it traveled away from us.  It made no sound the entire time.   Total time we observed it was 4-5 minutes.   We did not observe any other objects or any craft pursuing UFO.

records.summary: Daytime bright white light with 'heat wave' aura around it, flutters near Tampa airport.
records.story: Daytime bright white light with 'heat wave' aura around it, flutters near Tampa airport. After landing at Tampa International Airport, and while riding a shuttle bus to a car rental agency nearby, I observed what I first thought was a helicopter because of its slow speed and maneuvering, reflecting light from the sun.  As I continued to observe I saw that the object was round, very bright, and with a 'shimmering' aura around it.  It was about 1500 feet in the air and near the airport. It traveled in an 'up and down' pattern.  While watching it the object just disappeared, only to reappear again in the same spot.  It was a very bright white light, oval or round, with a 'heat wave' around it.  It then disappeared again and did not return.  I would estimate that the object was a mile away from my location.

Looking upward, I could see a bright white-ish ovular object, periodically two other small circular dark orange lights emerged at the top and bottom.  No motion, just floating there.  I checked google skymap and it said that it was likely Mars or Venus; which, I highly doubt.  We have an air force base in this area, but I really don't think it has anything to do with it either.  I have checked again before submitting this report and can confirm the object is gone ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: We noticed a bright silver, cigar-shaped UFO flying along the edge of a nearby storm cloud.
records.story: At 09:23, EDT, on Sunday, June 23rd, looking to the northwest out our front window, we saw a trailing edge of a thunderstorm moving from west to East over the city of Tampa, Fla.   Below that trailing edge, we noticed a bright silver, cigar-shaped UFO flying along the edge of the storm.  The UFO had no lights, no noise, no wings, and no apparent signs of propulsion.  It appeared to be approximately 2,500 to 3,000 feet above ground level, and although we could not determine its width because we could only see its port (left) side, the craft appeared to be about the length of two aircraft carriers.   The craft kept flying into and out of the storm clouds for about three minutes, then it came out of the clouds once more and flew off at a high rate of speed in a southwesterly direction, toward the Gulf of Mexico.   Due to the apparent distance and little time we could not get photos.

records.summary: Extremely bright white, stationary light, no details of object observable other than the bright light. Near Bill Currie Ford dealership
records.story: Extremely bright white, stationary light, no details of object observable other than the bright light. Near Bill Currie Ford dealership I exited my house at 12:45 am to pick my daughter in law up from the airport (she was supposed to arrive at 1 am).  I took a quick look around, thinking "at this hour, maybe I'll see something."  I immediately noticed a bright white light to the north of my house.  At first, I thought it was a helicopter, as it was over a main road (Dale Mabry) in our area but there were no other lights - just an extremely bright, stationary white light.  From the position, it looked like it was about a half mile from my house, just north of Hillsborough/Dale Mabry.  It was completely silent.  If it had been a helicopter, I would have heard it, as this area is subject to frequent auto accidents. I was in a rush to get to the airport, but kept an eye on the object in my rear view mirror as I was heading south to the airport.  TIA has a cell phone waiting lot, so while I was waiting there, I kept looking but couldn't see it from where I was. Once we were on our way back to the house, we had a brief glimpse of it through some trees but by the time we got back to where we would have been able to see it clearly, it was gone.

records.story: Three bright orange/red firey balls that looked road flares floating south along I-75, tree top level, and stacked vertically.  They seemed to be independent of each other.   I tried asking others on the cb radio if they seen it, but my radio was all static. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: I went out to walk my dog at 5:30am this morning, it's quite dark where I live and I can clearly see stars in the sky still at this tim
records.story: I went out to walk my dog at 5:30am this morning, it's quite dark where I live and I can clearly see stars in the sky still at this time.  I saw a circular object flash a bright blue light that lit up an area 100x brighter than any of the stars in the sky.   The object proceeded to move in quick diagonal directions quickly then flash again every 20-30 seconds or so.  I watched it move up down side to side at angles not made by any aircraft I know of.   There was no sound,  It would also come to a quick stand still then zip off again.  I have never seen anything like it.   Btw, I just had my vision checked a month ago and it's 20/20. ((NUFORC Note:  Source of the report elects to remain anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

The lights were moving SSE at a high rate of speed.  There was no noise associated with this sighting.  The lights were not flashing and seemed to be at a high altitude.

records.story: I was driving across the Gandy Bridge heading towards Tampa, when I saw a long green light traveling in a diagonal moving towards the Tampa side and then it just disappears like turning off a light.  It was green and cigar is shape.  I could not tell size or distance and I'm really good at that.  Former land surveyor.

records.summary: We were at Wheedon Island Preserve in the Tampa/St. Petersburg area.  I looked up into the clear blue sky admiring the nice day at appr
records.story: We were at Wheedon Island Preserve in the Tampa/St. Petersburg area.  I looked up into the clear blue sky admiring the nice day at approximately 4:15 pm and saw approximately 5 round/orb shaped flying objects hovering in one spot high in the sky.  They weren't a distinct color--more grey/white/glass looking.   I would not have believed my eyes, and attributed it to dirty sunglasses, but then my husband who was looking around as well looked up and entirely unprovoked said, "Do you see that?"  It was then I knew we were observing something unusual.   Moments later, they disappeared.  I scanned the horizon left and right to see where they went, but there was no trace.   I have a Master's degree, and my husband is also college educated.  We work in professional, "corporate America" jobs.   This was highly unusual and I felt warrants a report.

records.summary: Unexplained Lights in Night Sky North of Tampa.
records.story: Unexplained Lights in Night Sky North of Tampa. My wife and I were walking through the parking lot of the Pepin Center in Tampa, Florida, when I pointed out to her two lights in the north-northeast sky at approximately 20 degrees from the horizon. They were about the size and intensity of brightness as Sirius.  They were a thumb's distance apart and stationary. I pointed out to my wife that I didn't know of any constellation with stars that bright in the north sky in the Tampa area at this or any other time of the year.  After about a minute, the two stationary lights dimmed and then disappeared. Thoroughly perplexed as to what these were - - they were not satellites, meteorites, rockets/missiles,or aircraft landing lights.  Their altitude and actual size was impossible to determine. ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) Good evening Mr. Davenport: It's an honor to hear from you! I am very familiar with the landing lights of all manner of aircraft. I am both an aviation and astronomy buff and am well acquainted with both spheres of study. Within moments after this sighting, I did see a commercial airliner (by engine sound and configuration of landing and navigation lights, likely an Airbus A-319 or A-320 series or a Boeing 737) at about 5,000' AGL commencing a downwind (heading south for a north landing on Runway 35R) approach to Tampa International Airport(KTPA). That aircraft was due west when I spotted it - - I did wonder if anyone in it on its port side might have seen these two lights, but I suspect the lights were possibly too high and too far north to be seen in the field of vision of those in the cabin  - - I would love to know if someone did and was thinking that then!). The color of these lights was not typical of the landing lights of any aircraft that I have seen - - they were the same color, hue and intensity of self illuminated stars or reflective sunlight on satellites.  Although aircraft landing lights can and will often appear stationary, based on distance from, and the heading of, aircraft, such light inevitably moves or grows in intensity as it heads toward you.  Landing lights are seen either coming toward you or from the side, but would not be seen heading heading away from you.   My initial thought after knowing that these lights were not a normal part of the night sky for this part of the year was that they were satellites - - the major problem being that both of them did not move for several minutes but remained stationary.  Their fade out took about 5 seconds and was gradual and simultaneous - - both my wife and I were flummoxed by what we saw. If you have any other questions, please feel free to e-mail or call me at ((END ADDENDUM))
