records.summary: Red/Orange ball over Tampa FL seen by retired salesman
records.story: Red/Orange ball over Tampa FL seen by retired salesman UFO Report:  I am in Hillborough County Florida.  My address is Tampa, but I am actually in Northdale about 8 miles North of Tampa. At 7:49 PM, I walked into my office on the 3rd floor of my apartment building to get my keys.  The light was off and I noticed something outside of my plate glass window. Looking due East, I saw a bright red/orange light coming towards me from the horizon.  I got my cell phone out and videotaped it for the next 2 minutes and 20 seconds.  The fiery look settled down and I noticed it was a round orange globe, too big to be a planet, and too small to be the moon.   The skies were crystal clear.  It flashed orange lights a few times and then stayed white and seemed to be further away.  It drifted slowly to the south and stayed fixed for a minute or so.  Then it began drifting to the south more noticeably and stopped again.  After another minute or so, it simply disappeared.   I have an excellent quality video on my phone that shows this event really well. I am a retired salesman, 58 years old.  I moved to Florida from Kentucky 2 ½ years ago.  I am always sky watching.

records.summary: Very bright disk light object at a dead stop in the sky signals then zooms away.
records.story: Very bright disk light object at a dead stop in the sky signals then zooms away. On Sunday March 11th, 2018, a fairly bright light hovering in the sky caught my attention.  Upon further inspection, I can make out a disk shape in the sky basically parked in place. I'm always looking up hoping to see UFO's but I'm a semi-skeptical person.  So I stare at if for a while.  My little brother is fairly close to me, he follows my gaze and then rolls his eyes and says "Izzy relax, its probably just a plane."  To which I respond, "No David, look.  See behind that thing?  Moving slowly with the light? THATS a plane" and I point at a plane clearly visible much much farther BEHIND the object, moving slowly, and clearly identifiable by its blinking red navigation light. This proved two things.  The object was definitely parked in place, and it was not an ordinary aircraft because although the sun has set at 7:36, it was around 7:45 at the time and it was still bright out.  NOT bright enough for a normal aircraft to have its "brights" on.   The airplane cruising in the far distance only had a faint plane-shaped figure with no other lights on other than its red blinking navigation lights.  We both agree that this is weird, and as he continues to go on with his business (he was washing our mothers vehicle at the time of the incident). I decide to take out my phone and take a video of it. At this moment two things begin to happen.  My mother comes out of her adobe and I point at the UFO and tell her "mom look, it has NOT moved" and as I say those words I notice that there has been a change in the object.  The previously bright shining constant light emitted from the bottom of the aircraft has turned into a single light circling around and around the base of the aircraft.  After a few cycles, the light sequence changes yet again, but this time it does a sequential light signal pointing in the direction it is about to zoom to.  After five sequences it zooms at an impossible speed silently. Video can be seen here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0IIMh0mU6eI

records.summary: 4am I was up listening to podcasts on my smart phone. I work overnights.  And I was up relaxing after a week of work. I went to relieve
records.story: 4am I was up listening to podcasts on my smart phone. I work overnights.  And I was up relaxing after a week of work.  I went to relieve myself outside of my screened in pool area. The door is on the west side of my house.  My house faces south.  I looked up in the sky and saw the constellation Orion.  But just south of Orion I saw a mettalic disk with 3 black orbs directly under me.  I guess it was about 1,000ft above me.  As I looked,  I tried to comprehend what I was seeilg.  Then it shot of southward like a bullet leaving a streak of white light.

records.summary: On 7/21/18 20:58, I observed a very large red glowing cigar shaped light or object, fly from south to north over Tampa, Florida.
records.story: On 7/21/18 20:58, I observed a very large red glowing cigar shaped light or object, fly from south to north over Tampa, Florida. On 7/21/18 20:59, I observed a very large red glowing cigar shaped light, or object, fly from south to north over Tampa, Florida.  It was quite eerie, as it was a very unusual and intense color of red for it to be a jet aircraft on a landing approach to either Tampa International Airport or nearby MacDill AFB illuminating a bunch of clouds with its landing lights.  I have seen many normal aircraft fly through the clouds but never a color or shape like this.   The object appeared as a red glowing cigar shape for about 7 seconds, and then instantly changed shape to a much smaller but very intense bright white circular shaped object or light as it continued to fly in a northerly direction for about another 30 seconds.  I could see that the object had changed to a pulsing reddish orange glow as it flew away.  I never observed any typical red or green aircraft navigation strobe lights.   I was able to get several pictures of it from my cell phone, but unfortunately, not quickly enough to capture an image in the bright red cigar shape portion of the sighting.   There was never any sound of aircraft engines and there were no NASA rocket launches that evening at Cape Kennedy.  The entire sighting was about 45 seconds.   I have worked for military aerospace contractors for 15 years and consider myself well read on aircraft.

records.summary: (Star) Spherical light moving through the sky in irregular patterns.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: (Star) Spherical light moving through the sky in irregular patterns Have had many odd spiritual/other kind experiences; standing outside grilling with some friends and I get this urge to look straight up and I immediately focus on a light moving through the sky. This light was a star.  It was outside of our atmosphere and if it was standing completely still you would recognize it as a star.  Problem is, it was not standing still but moving in irregular, non-human patterns.  No piece of human technology known could make a movement like this. I knew what it was instantly but wanted everyone else to check it out to confirm; once they saw it, they started trying to explain what it was.  “It’s a drone.” “It’s a plane”. Those objections only lasted a few seconds as we stared at it cross the sky in the same irregular patterns.  One person freaked out and went inside.  The others sat and watched as it slowly disappeared and after we discussed what we had just seen. Please tell me someone else in the Tampa area saw this? ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.story: Saucer heading north, apparently slowing down. I thought it a high flying bird till it tilted on a 45-degree angle, and I saw the dome.  It was flying from South to North.

records.summary: Spotted 6 semi translucent lit objects in formation flying at a fast rate with no sound over Tampa heading South.
records.story: Spotted 6 semi translucent lit objects in formation flying at a fast rate with no sound over Tampa heading South. I am an Architect in the local area and I have a good eye for detail. My wife and I were sitting out on our back porch talking to her father on speaker phone while we both were looking towards the South. There was a nice crescent moon and a very clear sky with many stars. We then saw 6 semi translucent lit objects that each almost appeared like triangles. They seem to be in a semi camouflage state. No sound and the rate of speed was faster then a conventional jet but slower then a meteor. They were traveling in formation in a staggered v formation. Traveling from the North to South towards Mac Dill Air Force base. One note is the Mac Dill is currently doing Navy jet training in the area which started yesterday. Not sure if that is related or not. Very interesting siting.

records.summary: Moved like the Matrix fight scene
records.story: Moved like the Matrix fight scene Me and my friend where sitting in the front yard and I noticed an object floating like what seemed like was a a balloon or some sort of odd thing floating through the sky. we watched it going down behind a house, but then it started to rise again and when it did it came right above us , and the shape was sort of oval, then it sped away and broke up into many pieces and then all of the sudden as fast as it sped off it came back in the shape of many Circles moving like a slinky toy (It reminded me of the movie the Matrix  during the fight Scenes  and the way their hands where moving) and it came right toward us. Since me and my friend was in my front yard, my friend started to run in the house, me I walked toward it, and it came toward me, then the UFO. Stopped right above me. It was like a circle with a red light in the middle we stared at each other for about I would say for about 5 minutes because I walked right up to it (it was about 5to10 feet above my he! ad, and then it turned and left the same way it came.

records.summary: VIDEO CAN BE SEEN ON YOUTUBE AT https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pBKh9oyT-mU&t=18s   My mother and I are standing in the backyard until
records.story: VIDEO CAN BE SEEN ON YOUTUBE AT  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pBKh9oyT-mU&t=18s    My mother and I are standing in the backyard until I point out a row of transparent LEDs that were NOT moving But as I pointed it out to my mom, she turned only for it to finally start moving like crazy.. a mile away and in the same spot at the same time. Video starts as soon as we both start to look at it about 5 seconds after 1st seeing it. It then starts to come overhead only to be a mile away in the same instance. instant acceleration! It only started to behave and move in a straight line when a commercial plane started to come over the area

records.summary: outside with my mom, flat row of lights that seemed to dance and disappear showing up a mile away or right over our head in same second
records.story: outside with my mom, flat row of lights that seemed to dance and disappear showing up a mile away or right over our head in same second Me and my mother went out on our back porch for a cigarette. While she was talking to me I could see about 7 lights in a line slowly moving into view. these lights never deviated or changed position making it seem to be 1 craft. My mom could see my face as I thought in my head "If that thing starts moving, I am OUTTA HERE" sure enough as my mom turns around slowly in horror it now starts heading our way. recorded a video and dialogue between my mom and I as well as the craft is captured. craft was a compilation of 7 small lights bundled closely together. craft almost 'waited' for my mom to turn around as well before it started its dance. it would quickly maneuver 3 different directions impossibly before going completely invisible and showing up miles or a mile from last seen area. it did this maybe 5 or 6 times IN 5 or 6 seconds. Moved so quickly even my mother kept saying Why?? lights were pink on outside edges with violet or purple for the inside! 5 lights. its movements defied conventional physics, Newtonian forces would have destroyed anything else attempting that. As scared as i was, i did not want my mom to run inside without me. I explained to my mother that this craft is the united states navy x-37 - using mass reduction drive together with piezoelectric superconducting material (ultrasonic vibrations causing noble gas to ionize) she understandably didn't know what the hell i was talking about. I explained 'Ok, its meant to refill combat planes on the field, needing those movements and maneuvers not just to get around but to evade incoming fire . craft was with us for around 5 minutes now appearing overhead and a mile away in the same second. finally in the video (video shows craft as 1 blurry purple ball) I say 'Oh i think i can hear it, sounds exactly like an airplane' because craft was completely silent the entire time, as i said that i could see a regular commercial airline start to come around from the to! ps of houses. As soon as that happened, this craft became ...e! mbarrass ed? it stopped moving crazy and put itself on a straight trajectory, accelerating instantly but not going too insanely fast it b-lined until it went below horizon. my mother wouldn't go to sleep unless she found something similar online. which she did amazingly, and only based on the movements it was doing in the video were exactly the same speed and velocity as we saw. by 4 am my mother finally went to sleep content with what she saw online and in person that night. still confused, but happy someone else had filmed it. (object did leave a trail once before disappearing, prompting my body to think the ground was moving. I stood up but only that once did it seem to bounce and leave a trail)

records.summary: The ufo looked like a flying saucer with cloaking to make it look almost invisible but not quite.
records.story: The ufo looked like a flying saucer with cloaking to make it look almost invisible but not quite. Me and 2 other friends were walking home from the neighborhood pool. We were looking at the stars because one of the stars was really bright and looked kind of orange so we thought it was mars.  While looking at that star we noticed another bright light that looked the same but it was moving slowly like a plane. Then we noticed what we first thought was a giant bird.  It was gliding closer to us in a perfectly straight path. It was about three storys above us from what we could guess. As it approached it almost looked like a giant ufo dish shaped cloud. We would have thought it was a cloud if it wasn't perfectly disk shaped and gliding slowly over us but much faster than the clouds.  It looked like what you think of when you think traditional ufo dish. The only difference was that it was that shape but it seemed like it was cloaked to try to hide. We never would have saw it if we weren't looking at the sky because it was so faint.
